mapper.select: SELECT PURCHASE_LIST_NO, PRODUCT_NO, NAME, PRICE, PRODUCT_SIZE, ADDRESS, PURCHASE_DATE, REQUESTS, PURCHASE_LIST_QUANTITY, RECIPIENT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PURCHASE_LIST_NO, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.NAME, P.PRICE, P.PRODUCT_SIZE, P.ADDRESS, P.PURCHASE_DATE, P.REQUESTS, P.PURCHASE_LIST_QUANTITY, P.RECIPIENT FROM( SELECT PURCHASE_LIST_NO, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.NAME, P.PRICE, PL.PRODUCT_SIZE, PL.ADDRESS, PL.PURCHASE_DATE, REQUESTS, PURCHASE_LIST_QUANTITY, RECIPIENT FROM PURCHASE_LIST PL, MEMBER M, PRODUCT P WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = PL.MEMBER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_NO = PL.PRODUCT_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY PURCHASE_DATE DESC ) P ) PURCHASE_LIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_LIST PL, MEMBER M, PRODUCT P WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = PL.MEMBER_NO AND P.PRODUCT_NO = PL.PRODUCT_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

INSERT INTO PURCHASE_LIST (PURCHASE_LIST_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_SIZE, PURCHASE_DATE, REQUESTS, ADDRESS, PURCHASE_LIST_QUANTITY, RECIPIENT) VALUES (PURCHASE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{memberNo},#{productNo},#{productSize},SYSDATE,#{requests}, #{address},#{purchaseQuantity},#{recipient})
